input_text:
Job Title: Associate Product Manager

Location: New York, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Product Management

Description:
Company OverviewAugment Jobs leverages its software, recruiting expertise, and extensive network to automate the recruitment process for job seekers. The company partners with full-time employees, licensed recruiters, and employers to help job seekers navigate the oversaturated job market. Augment Jobs sources job opportunities for its clients and submits applications on their behalf once the clients approve the role. Augment Jobs clients save hundreds of hours on applications and focus their efforts on leveraging the platform to prepare for interviews.
Submit a staffing application to our recruiting team at https://airtable.com/appK6gxCEphlasWY6/shrA31a5FXCWvZAVd. 
Core ValuesClient Outcomes: We exhibit empathy on the nature of the job search process and include a Job Guarantee to ensure every client leaves Augment Jobs with a new job or promotion after working with us.Integrity: We represent our clients to employers and recruiters with the utmost honesty and transparency. This extends to all of our employees and clients who work with us. We work with candidates who accurately represent themselves and have an honor code.Partnership: We are committed to building and maintaining long-term relationships with our clients, coaches, and community.Education: We continuously learn and adapt to changing market conditions and inform our clients in real time on how to stand out in the job application process. Our clients can apply what they learn at Augment Jobs for the rest of their careers.Giving Back: We host free career consultations to build community and create accessibility.

Overview:We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Product Manager to join our innovative team. As a Product Manager, you will be responsible for the end-to-end lifecycle of our products, from conceptualization to launch and ongoing optimization. The ideal candidate will possess a strategic mindset, strong communication skills, and a proven ability to drive the development of successful products that meet both customer needs and business objectives.
Responsibilities:Product Strategy:Develop and articulate a clear product strategy aligned with overall business goals.Conduct market research to identify opportunities, trends, and competitive landscapes.Product Planning and Roadmapping:Create and maintain product roadmaps, outlining feature releases and enhancements.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to prioritize features and define release schedules.Requirements Definition:Gather and analyze user feedback, market research, and competitive analysis to define detailed product requirements.Work closely with design and development teams to ensure a clear understanding of product specifications.Product Development:Lead the product development process from concept to launch, ensuring timely and quality delivery.Collaborate with engineering, design, and QA teams to oversee the development of product features.Go-to-Market Strategy:Develop and execute go-to-market plans for product launches, including marketing, sales, and customer support strategies.Provide training and support to internal teams to ensure successful product adoption.Performance Monitoring:Establish and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of product initiatives.Implement adjustments and improvements based on performance data and user feedback.Stakeholder Communication:Communicate product updates, progress, and milestones to internal stakeholders and external partners.Act as a point of contact for product-related inquiries and issues.User Experience and Design Collaboration:Collaborate with UX/UI designers to create an exceptional user experience.Advocate for user-centric design principles throughout the product development process.
Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Computer Science, or a related field; MBA is a plus.Proven experience as a Product Manager, demonstrating successful product launches and improvements.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.Entrepreneurial mindset with a focus on innovation.Knowledge of industry trends and emerging technologies.
Learn More:https://www.augmentjobs.com/

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Associate Product Manager
output_json.summary: Join our innovative team as a Product Manager responsible for the end-to-end lifecycle of our products.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Computer Science, or a related field
soft_skills: Entrepreneurial mindset with a focus on innovation
Knowledge of industry trends and emerging technologies
job_responsibilities: Develop and articulate a clear product strategy aligned with overall business goals
Conduct market research to identify opportunities, trends, and competitive landscapes
Create and maintain product roadmaps, outlining feature releases and enhancements
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to prioritize features and define release schedules
Gather and analyze user feedback, market research, and competitive analysis to define detailed product requirements
Work closely with design and development teams to ensure a clear understanding of product specifications
Lead the product development process from concept to launch, ensuring timely and quality delivery
Collaborate with engineering, design, and QA teams to oversee the development of product features
Develop and execute go-to-market plans for product launches, including marketing, sales, and customer support strategies
Provide training and support to internal teams to ensure successful product adoption
Establish and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of product initiatives
Implement adjustments and improvements based on performance data and user feedback
Communicate product updates, progress, and milestones to internal stakeholders and external partners
Act as a point of contact for product-related inquiries and issues
Collaborate with UX/UI designers to create an exceptional user experience
Advocate for user-centric design principles throughout the product development process
output_json.company_information: Augment Jobs leverages its software, recruiting expertise, and extensive network to automate the recruitment process for job seekers. The company partners with full-time employees, licensed recruiters, and employers to help job seekers navigate the oversaturated job market. Augment Jobs sources job opportunities for its clients and submits applications on their behalf once the clients approve the role. Augment Jobs clients save hundreds of hours on applications and focus their efforts on leveraging the platform to prepare for interviews.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Core Values: Client Outcomes, Integrity, Partnership, Education, Giving Back
